Posts.Content: I would be interested in letter writing. Should warn you I am a grandmother ( youngish in outlook at least) but probably not a good match for you. I would like the opportunity to communicate through writing rather than messaging and am interested in the way other countries approach treatment. I have completed chemo, surgery and rads currently waiting for my first follow up mammogram. My cancer is triple negative. Whatever the outcome of the writing project I wish you the very best.
